front.title: Escape Pod
front.gametext: Save all characters, weapons, and devices aboard any just-lost capital starship. Relocate them to any planet site.
front.lore: Capital starships have emergency escape pods. Equipped with food, water, flares, medpacs, hunting blaster and tracking beacon (R2-D2 deactivated this one's beacon).

rulings: May not relocate weapons and devices deployed directly upon a starship or vehicle (e.g. Rectenna or Heavy Turbolaser Battery).
